Even though it seems to be easily removed by removing some page elements that include this pop-up and the overflow behind it an perhpas changing some properties of some elements. Unfortunately, I got distracted and now my limits are remporarily reinstated, so I can't provide the page code with this popup at this moment. Username: `@COOLak` ### Screenshots

issue.title: Cleanup obsolete rules or dead sites in JapaneseFilter (specific.txt)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

The following domains are inaccessible, sold, return a 403 error, or redirect to other domains. 
I accessed these domains using Chrome version 124.0.6367.91 on Windows 11, 23H2, with the UA left at its default (Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36)

comment.body: `sagafan.jp` is living, but I found a FP on `https://imarins.sagafan.jp/`.

issue.title: Cleanup obsolete rules or dead sites in JapaneseFilter (specific.txt)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.
